column3: ## Test notes searchable for admin and not for public
In the admin search, select Journal search, search for a journal and click on the "Edit Journal" button to edit the journal

column4: The journal edit form is displayed

column3: Add a note to a journal record by clicking on the "Add" button in the "Notes" section of the journal record and click on "save" button to save the new note

column4: The note is added to the journal record

column3: Go to the admin journal search again and search for the journal you added the note with the words given in the note

column4: The journal record is displayed in the search results

column3: Search for the journal from public search page with same words given in the note

column4: The journal record is not displayed in the search results

column3: Search for the journal from api search with same words given in the note

column4: The journal record is not displayed in the search results
